article_title: Single-payer backers say plan would rein in health costs
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Some clouds and possibly an isolated thunderstorm this afternoon. High 87F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Christian M. Wade Statehouse Reporter

og.description: BOSTON -- Nearly a decade after Massachusetts started requiring every citizen to carry health insurance, advocates say they're building support to again transform health care in the state.
og.title: Single-payer backers say plan would rein in health costs
